contentList.content: When attacking with a melee weapon you are <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with and are wielding in both hands, <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> take a -[1] penalty, but their damage increases by [2].

When you land a Critical Hit or kill a target with a melee weapon attack, you can make another melee weapon attack as a bonus action that turn.

Attacks with melee weapons you are Proficient with, and are wielding in both hands, can deal an additional 1d12 damage at the cost of a -4 Attack Roll penalty. On miss, you will be able to negate Attack Roll penalty and damage bonus with reaction.
You take a -4 penalty to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> you make with Heavy melee weapons.
You have a +1d12 bonus to damage rolls you make with Heavy melee weapons.
